recommendations: Usama Qazi ‚ÄúI have had the privilege of working alongside Ahmed and getting to know him personally during our professional journey. I am delighted to recommend him as a Project Manager based on his exceptional project management skills and dedication to his work. What sets Ahmed apart is his unique ability to approach every project with a blend of creativity and strategic thinking, consistently delivering results that surpass expectations. Ahmed is not only a highly competent professional but also a trusted friend who fosters a positive and collaborative work environment. His commendable ability to build strong relationships with team members and stakeholders makes him an invaluable asset. I'm confident that Ahmed will excel in his career and would be an amazing addition to any team seeking a proactive and results-oriented project manager.‚Äù

James Lee ‚ÄúI had the distinct pleasure of collaborating with Ahmed on various projects and I cannot overstate the positive impact he had on both the project and our team. Ahmed's exceptional qualities made working with him a genuinely enjoyable and productive experience. Ahmed's humility and soft-spoken nature fostered a sense of trust and cooperation in our team, which was essential to promoting effective collaboration. His unique blend of technical expertise, project management skills and genuine kindness makes him a truly exceptional project manager and colleague. I wholeheartedly recommend Ahmed for any project management or program management role and eagerly anticipate the opportunity to work with him again in the future.‚Äù
projects: [{"title":"Software Framework To Explore Automobile Models Using Leap Motion In Virtual Reality","start_date":"Jul 2015","description":"Used 3D motion control technology i.e. Leap motion to explore 3D automobile models. Thisis done by using hand gestures that comes naturally when interacting with real life objects.Google Cardboard is used to project the models in virtual reality and make the interactionwith them more natural.
